evals.prompt: I have an interview with HealthFirst for the VP of Engineering role on Friday. Help me prepare.
evals.expected_output: Loads HealthFirst metadata (strong match), job description, achievements, and narrative. Creates interview-prep.md with 3 talking points mapped to their requirements (AI/ML, team scaling, healthcare compliance), gap bridges for HITRUST and SOC2, likely questions for VP Eng role type, questions to ask them, and numbers cheat sheet.

evals.prompt: Netflix wants to do a technical panel for the DevOps Platform Lead role. This is a stretch match and I'm nervous about the Kubernetes and Terraform questions.
evals.expected_output: Loads Netflix metadata (stretch match with hard gaps). Creates prep focused on bridging gaps: frames CI/CD and cloud architecture as adjacent to platform engineering. Prepares talking points that lead with transferable skills. Acknowledges the stretch honestly. Generates panel-specific prep (multiple interviewer perspectives). Includes gap bridge scripts for Kubernetes and Terraform.

evals.prompt: Second round at HealthFirst â€” this time with the CTO and a principal engineer. My first interview went well but they were curious about HITRUST.
evals.expected_output: References the first interview debrief (if it exists). Prepares for CTO (strategic questions, vision alignment) and principal engineer (technical depth, architecture decisions). Specifically prepares a stronger HITRUST answer since it came up in round 1. Adjusts talking points for a more technical audience.
